LanguageData.CCC_IntakeFan.label: Intake fan
LanguageData.CCC_IntakeFan.description: The intake fan sucks ambiant air up and injects it in its connected network.
LanguageData.CCC_LargeIntakeFan.label: Large intake fan
LanguageData.CCC_LargeIntakeFan.description: As this name states, this is a larger version of the regular intake fan. It is also more efficient power-wise.
LanguageData.CCC_WallIntakeFan.label: Wall-mounted intake fan
LanguageData.CCC_WallIntakeFan.description: This intake fan mounted into a wall has a lower througput but also a lower footprint.
LanguageData.CCC_RedAirPipe.label: Red Air Pipe
LanguageData.CCC_RedAirPipe.description: This air pipe only connects to red pipes and buildings.
LanguageData.CCC_HiddenRedAirPipe.label: Covered Red Air Pipe
LanguageData.CCC_HiddenRedAirPipe.description: This air pipe built in the floor only connects to red pipes and buildings.
LanguageData.CCC_BlueAirPipe.label: Blue Air Pipe
LanguageData.CCC_BlueAirPipe.description: This air pipe only connects to blue pipes and buildings.
LanguageData.CCC_HiddenBlueAirPipe.label: Covered Blue Air Pipe
LanguageData.CCC_HiddenBlueAirPipe.description: This air pipe built in the floor only connects to blue pipes and buildings.
LanguageData.CCC_CyanAirPipe.label: Cyan air pipe
LanguageData.CCC_CyanAirPipe.description: This air pipe built in the floor only connects to cyan pipes and buildings.
LanguageData.CCC_HiddenCyanAirPipe.label: Covered cyan air pipe
LanguageData.CCC_HiddenCyanAirPipe.description: This air pipe built in the floor only connects to cyan pipes and buildings.
LanguageData.CCC_TempControl.label: Basic temperature control unit
LanguageData.CCC_TempControl.description: The temperature control unit cools or heats air from its connected network according to its target temperature. It is less efficient at full throughput and high temperature difference.
LanguageData.CCC_LargeTempControl.label: Industrial temperature control unit
LanguageData.CCC_LargeTempControl.description: A larger and more efficient version of the basic temperature control unit.
LanguageData.CCC_WallVent.label: Wall vent
LanguageData.CCC_WallVent.description: This vent built into a wall pushes conditioned air from its connected network.
LanguageData.CCC_SmallWallVent.label: Small wall vent
LanguageData.CCC_SmallWallVent.description: A smalller version of the wall vent.
LanguageData.CCC_SurroundVent.label: Surround vent
LanguageData.CCC_SurroundVent.description: This standalone vent pushes conditioned air in four directions.
LanguageData.CCC_WideSurroundVent.label: Wide surround vent
LanguageData.CCC_WideSurroundVent.description: A wider version of the surround vent.
